meanings.sent1: Young readers enjoy exploring new stories.
meanings.sent2: Libraries are filled with books for readers to borrow.
meanings.sent3: The readers in the library whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like readers, absorbing every word on the page.
meanings.sent5: The readers in the storybook came to life, dancing off the pages.

meanings.definition: A device used for magnifying text.
meanings.sent1: Some readers have a built-in light for reading in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The magnifying reader helped her see the tiny print clearly.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat knocked the reader off the table with a playful paw.
meanings.sent4: His glasses acted like readers, making the words appear larger than life.
meanings.sent5: The reader was a magical tool, revealing hidden details in the text.

meanings.definition: A book or other written material that is being read.
meanings.sent1: The adventure reader took them on a journey through far-off lands.
meanings.sent2: The reader was so captivating that she couldn't put it down.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the corner of the reader, leaving teeth marks.
meanings.sent4: The reader was a treasure trove of knowledge waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The reader whispered secrets of the past, unlocking mysteries of ancient times.
